name: Evil Alcohol
description:
Play in fullscreen. Download for a better experience.

Evil Alcohol is a turn based strategy game where you fight of bottles of alcohol.

Press target boombox/unit and than press an tile that is blue to move the boombox/unit there.  Press on the push button to attack with the scout it can only attack in front of it but can move afterwards. Press on the long push button to attack with the  sniper it can attack 3 tiles in front of it. Press on the heavy push button to attack with the tank it can only attack in front of it but pushes enemies 2 tiles instead of one.
